the Thai government has only recently banned cigarette advertising and that was in anticipation of them losing their Monopoly on sales up until last year Thailand prohibited Thai citizens from having any cigarettes other than those made by the Thai government the Thai government made plenty of cigarettes enough to even export to other countries so we're not talking about a government which is discouraging smoking we're talking about a government which is in the cigarette business and wants to protect that business but doesn't the government of a foreign country why
